attributes.additional_details:
Alan Turing has been pardoned, now it's time to put him in his rightful place on the next available bank note.

As one of the greatest Briton's of the 20th century he deserves his place on a bank note. His pioneering work broke the enigma codes of the Nazi's during WWII and saved the lives of thousands if not millions of people.

His work was the precursor to the modern computer and he deserves his place amongst the giants of British science.
